It requires the definition of objective, quantifiable measures of technical _ performance, which can be used to compare actual results against targets. Such technical performance measures _ may include weight, transaction times, number of delivered defects, storage capacity, etc. Deviation, such as _ demonstrating more or less functionality than planned at a milestone, can help to forecast the degree of success _ in achieving the project’s scope._ 11.6.2.5 reserve Analysis_ Throughout execution of the project, some risks may occur with positive or negative impacts on budget or _ schedule contingency reserves.
